Here is another use case for a parameter to @Ignore. We do our development =
on Linux, PCs, 
and Macs but deploy on Linux boxes. There are some features=
 of our software that will only 
run on the Linux systems and their unit te=
sts reflect that. It would be great if we could mark 
those tests to be ign=
ored when run on the other machines.
